column1: I was surprised cause I didn't think it would help any and I was wrong I use it every night. My face looks better. I'm going to keep using.

I bought this a week ago and use it morning and night. I have drastically seen a difference in my face! I have comdonal closed acne and nothing had worked from OTC to prescription. This is the first thing to actually work!!! I use it with my other revitalift glycolic products!! I am in love and I want to say thank you for making products that actually work!!!

I'm in love with this product! Even though I saw great reviews online when I was buying it, I didn't expect the results to be so immediate. I use it at night and my skin was amazingly smooth in the morning right after the first application! It's been really helping with the texture on my skin. I will definitely try the other products from this line. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Just once a day (at bedtime) because my skin is sensitive and I have to wear sunscreen (SPF45) daily, rain or shine, indoors or out. This stuff gradually evens out skin discoloration--I have a sprinkling of darkish patches of color on my cheeks and have noticed they are much less noticeable with this moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've been using the Bright Reveal line for a couple of weeks. My skin looks smoother, brighter, and has a nice glow. I'm happy!

I love how this made my skin so soft just in one overnight use. My skin looked brighter in about 1 week. It is easy to use but I did have an issue with the pump sometimes only having one side of the moisturizer come out.

I have been an Licensed Esthetetician for 17 years and I test every thing. I gave your Bright Reveal Dual Overnight Moisturizer a try and after one night my skin is Beautiful! Nice firmness with no dryness including plumpness! My slight lines are invisible and my light sun spots faded gently. I use professional medical grade skincare and I am impressed with your product.

I purchased this product several weeks ago and would not repurchase. Despite following directions on the package and I quote, "Before the first application, tap the bottle on a hard surface and press the center of the pump several times", the two sides do not come out evenly. It may be a good product but if a person can't use it per the directions, how can the results be observed.

I received this product as a sample a year ago. I fell in love with it. I never use night creams or follow a skin care regiment but this product got me hook. Leaves my skin really soft and had brightened my complexion. As well I notice my fine wrinkles are know less noticeable. I highly recommend this line of products. After my sample run out I continue purchasing and is now part of my nightly routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample a while back and loved it so I went to my local drugstore to purchase one. This is quiet pricey. However, it is worth the money. It is not too oily on my oily/combination skin. I use it every night and it does help with improving my complexions.

I've been using this and the daytime version for about a year. Love the way my skin looks in the morning. This morning after I washed my face, I put the daytime version on to prepare for makeup. As I was putting on my blush, I realized I had forgot to put on foundation first! My skin looked so good I couldn't tell I hadn't put on any foundation. Now that's a good review!

I have been using Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer for about 4 months. I love the serum and lotion in one package. However I am only using the lotion as the serum portion is no longer coming out of the dispenser. Do I break open the outer plastic covering to get the serum?? I love the way my 59 year old skin looks..it's soft and smooth and wrinkle free!!! Please L'Oreal fix the packaging... I would have rated this 5 stars...but I'm keeping a star because I'm only using half the product.

This moisturizer is an outstanding nighttime ritual! I love the entire product line but as an aging women I love even more that after a few short works of use I have visible results that I can see!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It does moisturize very well with a small amount of product. I have noticed line shrinkage around my eyes especially.
It really looks moisturized and softer in the morning. It locks in moisture but is not oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The texture of this lotion is light and it has maximum brightening effect. It's the strongest on the market. Thank God for L'oreal. It helps.
Loved this Revitalift overnight moisturizer! I have used it before but when I needed to buy more, they had taken it out of WM stores (which WM does a lot with something I like)
I only been using this overnight moisturizer for few nights and i already love it so does my skin. I wish they carry more of this in the store.
Product Doesn't Come Out of the right (white) side despite shaking it, hitting it on hard surface, etc. Disappointing.
I love this line, but the dual overnight moisturizer, has a horrible delivery system. This container is awful. This has been a problem last few yrs, why dont you change it ??
I use this product under my night cream before bed and under the sunscreen during
the day. I've noticed that my skin improved in terms of reduced fine lines and it feels refreshed!

I've used this product for several years prior to this order so it was no surprise how well it works. I just won't be without it. Leaves my skin soft and smooth, and after using it for several weeks any blemish I might have had is completely gone.
This stuff is amazing!! I've been using for a few weeks now. My skin is smoother and more radiant!! My youthful glow is back, fine lines are smoothed out!! The dullness is gone!!

I purchased the entire line of brightening products. I like the feel of the moisturizer. It's not to oily feeling and that's perfect for my naturally oily skin. I didn't see that much of a difference in my overall complexion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Bought this about a week ago and already notice a difference in my skin. It looks brighter and so smooth in the morning after using.
I use this at night, and the next day my skin looks and feels rejuvenated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It makes the skin so sooth, bright and moisture. I add SFP day cream on top and Night cream at night for better result.
It's good to use around neck area, it's fast absorbing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I used this product and within one week I was able to see a visible difference. This is now part of my daily regimen. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use cleanser, revitalift pads and this dual overnight! Great clean and fresh feeling! I also, use other skin care and eye creams. I also, like to try new L'Oreal products to add to my skin regimen! Nightly and daily!

I purchased this about a month ago. I was looking for an overnight moisturizer that would improve my skin. I followed the directions for use and was very disappointed that I would wake up in the morning and still feel like the product was sitting on top of my skin. It felt as though it never absorbed and was a layer that sat on top. I would have to rinse my face in the morning as to not feel like I would be sweating it off as soon as the day got warm. I am very disappointed. This has been a complete waste of money.
I did like the luminous look and it did moisturize but I didn't notice and lift or great moisture

I've been using this product for just a few days and have already seen dramatic results. My skin is soft and hydrated each morning and I think my age/sun spots are already fading. Love this product - HATE the dispenser...please fix!!

Love this product. Nice light fragrance that doesn't break me out. It's not heavy and glides on so smooth. My skin completely absorbs this. Noticed a difference after initial use. Will keep this in my daily rotation.

I really loved the overnight feeling of the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer. I could feel the moisture softness on my face in the morning. My skin starting getting moisture, specially living in a dry hot place. I have also switched my Clinique moisturizer to The L'Oreal Paris Dual Overnight Moisturizer. Very happy with the lasting feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm 45 with combination skin of oily t-zone and dry every where else. As a mom of 5 with youngest 3 year old twins. My body and skin have gone through a lot. I always have issues with night creams being too heavy or simply not enough. This night cream worked great on my skin on my skin and the transition was smooth. I didn't break out. AAA+++ It left my skin feeling great and brighter!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use the dual overnight moisturizer every night and it has paid off! After 30 days, the bags under my eyes are pretty much gone and the fine lines and wrinkles on my forehead have definitely diminished! I still have sun/age spots that I can't seem to get rid of, but look at my results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using LOreal Bright Reveal Brightening Duel Overnight moisturizer every night before I go to bed. It has a very pleasant mild scent, not overpowering or chemically at all. I absolutely love the combo Glycolic, vitamin C and Pro-retinol provide to my skin. In the morning my skin is extremely soft, and taut. My overall tone has also balanced out. So greatful fot this line! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have oily skin so I wasn't too sure about trying this. I tried it on the weekends and I was surprised that it didn't leave my face oily. In the morning my skin felt moisturized but not oily at all. It had the right balance. Will purchase! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the Loreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Dual Overnight Moisturizer!! It not only moisturized myface, but also replenished my usual dry skin. I loved that it was not heavily scented nor did it sting on my face. It left my face very soft and clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm head over heels for this product is light, creamy rich and yet has no sticky feel . My skin really felt pampered with this product and it worked wonders on my complexion and overall skin .For me its the best product among the L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal collection. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am not very consistent with using moisturizers to be honest, but I really wanted to put this product to the test. I hate the oily greasy feeling of moisturizer, especially the next morning. Most times they just seemed to make my face more oily. After only a couple night's use I could tell this was different. There was no greasy feeling the next day. I forgot to put it on one night and actually had to get up and go put it on. My skin feels amazing now. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This dual moisturizer is effective at moisturizing overnight. My skin is brighter, and more evenly toned. Some of the splotches and redness I have are diminished. I also have less acne to contend with on a daily basis. I was surprised at how gentle this formula is on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer is amazing. I have sensitive skin, especially in the winter with the temp changes.. my face gets dry (cheeks, nose, chin) and oily (forehead) and I struggle with a moisturizer at night that works without making either the dryness worse or making more oily. This was PERFECT! No irritation at all and within 2 days of using it my skin was so soft and felt great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Super light weight dual evening moisturizer that left my skin feeling clean, soft and refreshed for a good nights sleep. Upon waking up, my skin was not over dry or tight. It was smooth and moisturized. There was a noticeable difference in my fine lines around my mouth after 2 weeks of use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love all the L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal products I received from BzzAgent. I used the Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer every night after cleansing my skin with the scrub and peel pads. I LOVE this overnight moisturizer! My skin felt wonderful and was still soft and smooth the next morning! My skin looks wonderful after using these products for 2 weeks. LOVE It!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like how this moisturizer feels on my skin. I have pretty sensitive skin and so many creams feel heavy to me. This moisturizer felt rich but not thick or greasy. I liked how it absorbed quickly and did not leave my skin feeling sticky or goopy. I felt comfortable putting it on right before bed because I didn't have to worry about it getting all over my sheets. The two-part serum was easy to mix up in my hands and never felt heavy. I'm really liking what this did for my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

VERY hydrating. I used a bit more than necessary the first night. I was pleased with this moisturizer. It's a bit heavier than the day time one, but did an amazing job, even though I wasn't religious about night time moisturizing. I will definitely be using this more often, if Florida ever gets a "winter." [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think L'oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Dual overnight moisturizer would be good for just about anyone. When I wake up my skin feels and looks so much healthier and younger looking. I can definitely see fine lines getting smaller. I use a.m. and p.m. , plan on purchasing again. It doesn't take very much so it's very much worth the price! Good product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Thankfully, I dont have some of the issues (wrinkles, uneven skin tone ) that this line of products addresses, but I definately feel like my face and neck area are smoother and brighter. I can totally see how this would work like a champ on the aforementioned issues. The 2 part cream is light and non greasy, and my skin felt very alive after using. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer doesn't leave my skin with a greasy feeling after applying it. It goes on light and smooth and has helped reduce the fine lines around my eyes. I like that it's a dual action moisturizer and think it's helped even out my skin tone a lot! I would recommend trying all of the products and using them together to get the best results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved that the serum and moisturizer were in one product. The packaging was a definite plus. It made me feel like I was putting something expensive on my face. This may well become part of my daily routine. #Gotitfree from Bzzagent and Loreal [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Every night I would look forward to using my L'Oréal Brightening Dual Moisturizer. My skin has never felt so silky smooth! The dual dispenser looks very nice so can stay out in plain sight and the pump worked perfectly every time! It has a nice light citrus scent! I used 2-3 pumps every night and it was plenty for my face and neck. And as a bonus my hands have gotten softer too. This moisturizer is a face care essential! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really wanted to be impressed with this product. The dual pump somehow made me think it was going to be better than all my other moisturizers, but boy was I fooled. A cold cream works better than this. Yes, my skin felt somewhat smoother, but it almost left s weird film on it. I wouldn't recommend. It's just okay in my opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I hardly ever use moisturizer, just cause I forget, but with Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer I could not wait to get to my nightly ritual. The results of this product where amazing. My face and skin not only looked brighter, fresher and more toned after 30 days, but I think I look younger too. This is a product I will buy over. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Duel Overnight Moisturizer for almost 30 days. It makes my skin feel soft and smooth. In just a few weeks my skin is brighter and more youthful looking. I will continue to use this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved Revitalift Dual Moisturizer because its creamy and I saw a change in my skin in two weeks. My acne spurts disappeared and that put a happy face on this adult. I love that the product is anti-wrinkle and the pump feature gives you enough product to cover entire face and neck. This product made my face feel softer , brighter and acne free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Just finished using this for 30 days. Loved it starting at day one! It really moisturizes after skin is prepped using peel pads. Has an orange citrus smell that I really like. Leaves a glow that is instantly noticeable. Not feeling the winter dry skin on my face that I usually do this time of year. Prefer this to my department store night time moisturizer. Will definitely continue to use this product. Skin feels refreshed. Cost is a bonus! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

LOVING MY SKIN! Since trying the L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal collection! My skin feels so smooth, My face looks brighter and my tone is a lot more even!!! I will definitely keep these wonderful products as part of my skincare routine!! I totally recommend these products to anyone who has trouble with an uneven tone!! I seen the changes in my skin in one week of using these products!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer is effective and fun to use. I have used this product nightly now for over 30 days and am happy with it. I like the way the clear and creamy products are kept separately in the bottle and then come together when you dispense the product. I only needed one small pump of moisturizer each night for my skin to feel hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was so happy to recieve the Loreal Brighting Line to try out. I had seen it advertised on television and wanted to try it so i was so happy that i quailified for this campaign. The product felt so good going on and made my skin feel like silk. I had to give it such a low rating because the line of products caused me to have an alleragic reaction. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think L'Oréal bright reveal dual overnight moisturizer is a good product. I have used it for 3 weeks and am seeing a pretty big difference around my eyes. I recommend this to anyone with skin starting to age. The kit together is great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I apply this moisturizer after washing my face before bed. Since it's been cold the heater is drying out my skin usually. But in the morning I've awakened with my skin still soft and moisturized! I'm impressed. This is definitely going to be apart of my nightly routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used the moisturizer every night. It left my face feeling soft and smooth. It did not feel oily or heavy. I especially love the scent. It has just the right amount of scent, it is not overpowering. I little bit goes a long way. I will definitely be purchasing it in the future and recommending to friends and family. This will forever remain part of my skincare routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer is definately a must have. I apply this every night before bed and I am definately impressed by how well it works. My skin is much brighter, smoother and I have noticed less visable lines and wrinkles. After using this product I cant imagine my life without it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I overnight moisturizer from the reveal collection was really great at first once pumped into hands it feels really stick but glides well when applying to face. After it feels still sticky it takes a few seconds for it to skin onto face after it feel soft and refresh. When I wake I can feel my face feeling soft and looking glowy. I really am happy with the results. I will continue using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer works well. I like that it has a good scent and helps smooth fine lines. It left my skin feeling softer, fresher and more radiant. My face seemed brighter after using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this night moisturizer. It really leaves the skin smooth and soft when you get up in the morning. I like the smell and it is just the right strength. It is really easy to apply and absorbs into the skin quickly. I did not see any anti-aging benefits but it does moisturize. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This dual chamber night cream is the BEST I have ever used, my skin feels as smooth as silk after its applied. It absorbs completely with no greasy feel. I cannot say enough good things about this product I will not be without this product it is permanently part of my skin care regiment [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am not completely in love with this moisturizer. It feels a little thin to me for an overnight moisturizer. I can't really feel it on my face within 15 minutes of putting it on. It's lightly scented though which is a plus. I don't really notice or feel much of a difference in my skin when I use it. I don't feel the price is justifiable for what you get. Its just okay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using the L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal collection for a couple of weeks now and I love the way it makes my skin feel and look. It is smoother than I can ever remember and my dullness is gone. This is super impressive to me in particular being as I am over 40 and the cold temps have set in where I live. I'm looking forward to continuing the system through the winter - hoping to keep my skin out of the winter doldrums. So far so good! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the L'Oreal overnight Brightning moisturizer is a keeper in my daily skincare routine. It smells so good and goes on smoothly. It only takes one pump to do your whole face and neck so it should last a while. When I wake up in the morning my skin looks so radiant and fresh. I will definitely keep this as my skincare routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Revitalift Bright Reveal Overnight Moisturizer for more then 30 days. A little goes a long way. At the beginning I felt it was too thick I think it was because I was not used to using moisturizer at night but after two weeks of using it I didn't even notice I had it on. After getting compliments for my husband and my kids about how clear my skin looks I think this will be my one of my favorite products to use. I would more certainly buy it again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I currently use another nighttime moisturizer, but was up for a try. I think it was ok, I think I just prefer the one I have been using. I feel that it does have some ingredients in it that I am not as familiar with and I try to be very careful about toxics and what is absorbed in my skin. If I didn't have another product that I felt safer about the ingredients and the feel after I apply, I would be open to using this product as I think it is good. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the this product is amazing! I look forward to applying it every night! It moisturizes my skin very well and gives me an amazing glow when I wake up. I love the smooth, silky feel of my facial skin after application. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This makes my skin feel so good after having it on at night. When I wake up in the morning, my skin is glowing and super soft. The lotion is really nice and creamy and goes on easy. It also smells very good. I highly recommend this as it makes my skin feel great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Like a women we need care our skin and follow a night routine is very importan this Dual Overnight Moustizer help me to keep my skin improve while im sleep and looks radiant every morning In the pic my mom (56 )and me (37) using all Loreal stuff [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is the best product out of the collection. I did get some visible results during my 30 day use of the product. I can see a lightening of a dark area on my face and my whole face seemed brighter - I am not kidding. The stable packaging of the ingredients is a plus! I would buy this again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I want an overnight moisturizer that would be absorbed by the skin and yet leave it feeling soft. I got exactly this and more from the L'Oreal Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer! My skin was not sticky, and I woke up the next morning to a still soft and well moistened skin. Thank you L'Oreal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This overnight moisturizer is not like others I have tried. I have combination skin & most moisturizers leave my skin feeling slimy or greasy after application. This one did not do that in the least. I applied it at night after cleansing and before bed & could still feel & see the benefits the next morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I felt like this product really exceeded my expectations. It isn't a heavy product, it absorbs quickly and has a fresh smell. I used the entire line and I was so pleased in fact, that I also purchased the products for my mother. In my opinion, the price is very reasonable for what the product offers. Two enthusiastic thumbs up! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Revitalift Bright Reveal Dual Overnight Moisturizer has become an essential part of my nightly skin care routine. I begin with the scrub cleanser, then the peel pads and finally the overnight moisturizer. It is so easy to apply and leaves my face looking and feeling wonderful....so soft!!! This moisturizer has a nice scent! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After weeks of using L'OREAL Paris Revitalift dual overnight moisturizer I have been waking up to a more hydrated face. It's rejuvenated my face for the past 4 plus weeks I'm very pleased with this face product. It glide on smoothly and absorbs nicely in to my skin leaving it with a velvety softness. Just like the day moisturizer I appreciate this product soo much. I high recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this every night for eight weeks. I loved that I only needed a very small amount to use. This applied really smoothly absorbed fast. It doesn't has a strong scent which I like. My skin looks great after the eight weeks. My skin is smoother and brighter. I would buy this again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked this product. I like how moisturizing it is and I like that it contains essential anti-aging ingredients such as glycolic acid and retinol. As mentioned in a previous review, I had to discontinue using this line of products due to overdrying of my skin. That was disappointing because I was excited to try all of these products. Otherwise, it feels great on the skin and I would be willing to try this again in the near future without other glycolic containing products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I very much enjoyed the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer. I used it each night for 30 nights. Only a small dab was necessary. I have combination skin, which goes oily in the summer and dry in the winter. I could tell my skin was changing during this period of time. I just used a little more and it was perfect. In my experience, this is a fantastic overnight moisturizer for combination skin, like mine, and for different seasons. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has a light citrus scent. It feels great going on. It's a little bit of an issue trying to make sure that the two products come out evenly. Just like with the daytime moisturizer, when using this in conjunction with the rest of the Revitalift products, it didn't provide enough moisture for me. If I were to continue using it, it would not be with the rest of the line. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this serum and moisturizer combo cause it's so convenient and takes up less space on my counter. I like that it comes out side by side so I can apply the serum first and then apply the moisturizer. They both sink in rather quickly and in the month I have been using it I have noticed a difference in my skins texture and brightness. Best part it did not break me out since my combo skin is sometimes a bit fussy with new products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is a very nice dual moisturizer. I love the smell and it goes on nice and smooth. It isn't heavy at all and does a nice job of moisturizing, , although I am used to a thicker/heavier night cream, I liked this just fine. I honestly don't see much brighter skin, but it is soft and smooth and no irritation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Overnight cream at it's best. I have never been one to keep up with using a night cream. After looking at younger pictures I've decided it's time for it. This is a refreshing product that doest feel to heavy or caked on. I used on pump and it was plenty. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My face feels so incredibly soft and much more smooth after using this for over a month. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is need of a good moisturizer that works and wants results. I feel as if my skin tone is evened out a bit more, and I was coming out of my summer time tan and this helped tremendously. I love this new L'Oreal Revitalift overnight moisturizer ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this moisturizer simply doesn't need to have glycolic acid in it. If you are using the peel pads, that should be enough. I prefer my moisturizer to soothe and lock in moisture after my actives rather than be another treatment added on. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening overnight moisturizer for going on two months it makes my face feel fresh and smooth when I awake in the morning I told all my friends and family that they need to try this product they will love it I'm glad I had the opportunity to try #gotitfree [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really loved using Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer, it provided my skin hydration and left it fully moisturized, it absorbed well into my skin leaving my skin soft and not sticky ,after a week of use my skin looks brighter and is more even toned I will definetly be using this product because it worked for me [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Dual Overnight Moisturizer is great. I wake up and my skin is soft and feels hydrated. I feel as though it is one of the best products out there for overnight. Doesn't make your skin feel greasy and smells amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am doing the L'Oreal 30 Day Challenge thanks to BzzAgent and was able to try this product as part of that challenge. Revitalift Bright Reveal Dual Overnight Moisturizer is definitely a great product. Within my first week my skin looked softer, smoother, and younger because of the two anti-aging treatments in one. I especially likes that it didn't leave my skin feeling greasy like a lot of moisturizers do. I only feel and look beautiful after using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for about a month now and with my nightly routine of using the L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Brightening Daily Scrub Cleanser first and then this overnight moisturizer. My skin feels soft and looks brighter. I am in my mid 40's and needed to start a good routine to enhance my skins appearance. I think that the dual overnight moisturizer was like a mini vacation of hydration for your skin to soak up during the night to feel smooth in the morning and like there has been some elasticity returned to that face and neck. It make the skin feel so good. It also helped my skin feel more uniform and even it felt like it was even a little birther all over. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought this dual overnight moisturizer was amazing! It was not greasy or heavy and just a very little pea sized amout was plenty. One little bottle will last a long time. It made my skin feel so soft and smooth and glowing, when I woke up in the morning. My skin felt as though it was regaining elasticity and brightness. A total powerhouse in a bottle!
